title: Divya Kundan & Emerald Jadau Haaram with Pink Stone Accents
materials: Pink Carved Stone Beads. Expertly crafted with a rich Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricately designed Kundan setting with floral motifs and delicate filigree work. The central emerald cabochon adds a touch of regal elegance. Features a detachable pendant with a matching emerald and pink stone accents. Classic South Indian design with a contemporary choker style.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham and half-saree functions (Langa Voni Function). A statement piece for grand celebrations.
description: Authentic Kundan craftsmanship passed down through generations, guaranteeing exceptional quality and artistry. The detachable pendant offers versatility, allowing you to style it with different outfits. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, while the pink stones add a touch of femininity. A valuable heirloom to be treasured for years to come.
